data.title: Theodore Bikel
data.text:
AKA Theodor Meir Bikel

Born: 2-May-1924

Birthplace: Vienna, Austria

Died: 21-Jul-2015

Location of death: Los Angeles, CA

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Buried, Hillside Memorial Park, Culver City, CA

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor, Singer

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The Defiant Ones

Wife: Ofra Ichilov (m. 1950s, div.)

Wife: Rita Weinberg Call (m. 2-Apr-1967, two sons)

Wife: Tamara Brooks (pianist, m. 11-Nov-2008, d. 2012)

Wife: Aimee Ginsburg-Bikel (m. 2013 until his death)

Son: Robert

Son: Danny

Son: Zeev Ginsburg (stepson)

Son: Noam Ginsburg (stepson)

National Council on the Arts (1977-82)

Actors' Equity Association President (1973-82)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Little Traitor (Sep-2007) · Interrogator

Crime and Punishment (27-Jun-2002)

Second Chances (1-Sep-1998)

Shadow Conspiracy (25-Jan-1997)

Benefit of the Doubt (1-Apr-1993)

Shattered (25-Sep-1991)

The Final Days (29-Oct-1989)

See You in the Morning (14-Apr-1989)

Dark Tower (1987)

Victory at Entebbe (13-Dec-1976)

Murder on Flight 502 (21-Nov-1975)

The Little Ark (Mar-1972)

200 Motels (10-Nov-1971) · Rance Muhammitz

Darker Than Amber (14-Aug-1970)

My Side of the Mountain (25-Jun-1969)

Sweet November (8-Feb-1968) · Alonzo

The Russians Are Coming, the Russians Are Coming (25-May-1966) · Captain

My Fair Lady (21-Oct-1964) · Zoltan Karpathy

A Dog of Flanders (31-Mar-1960)

The Blue Angel (4-Sep-1959)

The Angry Hills (15-Jul-1959) · Tassos

Woman Obsessed (27-May-1959)

I Want to Live! (18-Nov-1958) · Carl Palmberg

The Defiant Ones (14-Aug-1958) · Sheriff Max Muller

Fräulein (8-Jun-1958) · Col. Dmitri Bucaron

I Bury the Living (1958) · Andy McKee

The Enemy Below (25-Dec-1957) · Heinie Schwaffer

The Pride and the Passion (10-Jul-1957)

The Vintage (8-May-1957) · Eduardo Uribari

Escape from the Iron Curtain (1956) · Kosice

Above Us the Waves (8-Aug-1955)

The Colditz Story (26-Feb-1955)

The Divided Heart (9-Nov-1954)

Chance Meeting (24-Aug-1954) · Joseph

Forbidden Cargo (4-May-1954)

The Love Lottery (Jan-1954)

The Little Kidnappers (Dec-1953)

A Day to Remember (10-Nov-1953)

Melba (24-Jun-1953)

Never Let Me Go (1-May-1953) · Lieutenant

Desperate Moment (17-Mar-1953)

Moulin Rouge (23-Dec-1952)

The African Queen (23-Dec-1951) · First Officer
